segments.text: Good afternoon , is there a vacant room here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are practically full up , but I will see . What do you want , a single room or a double one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A single room , preferably with a bath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long do you plan to stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can have a room on the second floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope it's quiet . I hate noise at night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you will find it quiet . It faces the courtyard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The current rate is 50 dollars per night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A radio , a color television , a telephone and a major international newspaper delivered to your room everyday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Well , do you give discount for a week or more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we give 5 % discount for one week , 10 % for two weeks and more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I will take a room for a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you fill out this form , please ? The bellboy will show you up to your room . Your luggage will be brought right up .
segments.speaker: S2
